education.description: Attended for Computer Science from 2018 - 2019. Prior experience with web technologies and software development provided an opportunity to join industry early.
Attended full time senior year of high school.

highlights: Improved UX responsiveness and reduced memory consumption by 30% by selecting new front-end framework for in-vehicle-display systems
Optimized JavaScript code to support WebGL animation and updates to UI at 10x a second from data streamed over websocket
Implemented custom turn by turn navigation and routing system on top of Mapbox GL JS
Added test automation and static analysis to our continuous integration pipeline, resulting in higher change confidence and faster software delivery
Reviewed pull requests and established clear coding guidelines and standards
Wrote unit, integration and E2E tests in popular JavaScript testing frameworks
Developed processes for reporting Vehicle Repair Team’s response time to customers—establishing the correlation of response time and overall cost
Decreased losses due to delay in response by splitting the team; one group to focus on expediting smaller claims and the other designated to resolve lengthier, higher impact claims

keywords: NoSQL (MongoDB, AsyncStorage, IndexDB, AWS S3, AWS DynamoDB)
